983470.name: Katy and Bob: Safari Cafe Soundtrack
983470.description:
Katy and Bob: onwards to safari cafes! Want to dive into the safari world with Katy and Bob: Safari Cafe soundtracks?
You can go on a safari journey at any time!
We have collected for you great soundtracks, which will help to feel safari atmosphere.

List of soundtracks:
Track 1 - 00:32
Track 2 - 01:04
Track 3 - 00:32
Track 4 - 00:32
Track 5 - 01:36
Track 6 - 01:36
Track 7 - 01:36

Note:
All soundtrack are in the format .mp3
Album's soundtrack will be placed in a folder containing the game Katy and Bob: Safari Cafe.
983470.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
